General.Name: Guirenniao Co Ltd
General.Description: Guirenniao Co., Ltd. researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells sports shoes and sportswear through online and offline channels in China and internationally. It also produces, wholesales, and retails sporting goods and equipment, as well as manufactures leather products. The company engages in the goods and technology import and export, trade brokerage, and agency services. In addition, it retails edible agricultural products and offers grain related products. Guirenniao Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, China.
General.Address: Chendai Guiren Bird Industrial Park, Jinjiang, China
